div.p: [In …] 75 arourai; [x arourai?] of vinedressers … . In Parorion, 10 arourai and 5 arourai cultivated by Silvanos. In Skenai and Taie, to the north 4 arourai, another 28 arourai, another 11 arourai, another 3 arourai, another 6 arourai, another 5 arourai, another 7 arourai, another 46 2/3 arourai, another 21 arourai, another 4 arourai, another 12 arourai, another 4 arourai of uninundated land, another 7 arourai cultivated by the plasterer, another 1 1/2 arourai, total ⟦150+⟧ 160 arourai, and of the orchard land (?) … 7 arourai. Translation: E. Chepel, Tyche 33 (2018) 46-47
